Home Media: Dingo was released on DVD by Umbrella Entertainment in July 2005. The DVD is compatible with all region codes and includes special features such as a new 5.1 channel soundtrack, trailers, and an image gallery.[4]
Music: Davis, who plays the role of Cross, provided the film's soundtrack in cooperation with Michel Legrand.
Production: The movie was filmed in Meekatharra, Perth, and Sandstone, Western Australia, as well as Paris, France.[2]Christian Faure was the assistant director of the movie.
Box office: Dingo grossed $132,500 at the box office in Australia.[3]
produced_by: Rolf de Heer Giorgio Draskovic Marie-Pascale Osterrieth Marc Rosenberg
starring: Colin Friels Miles Davis Onzy Matthews
